feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 37. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 24.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
